DM Examples

DM objects are used to manage communication between the algebraic structures in PETSc (Vec and Mat) and mesh data structures in PDE-based (or other) simulations. See, for example, DMDACreate().

ex1.cxx: Simple MOAB example\n\n
ex2.cxx: Create a box mesh with DMMoab and test defining a tag on the mesh\n\n
ex3.cxx: Create a box mesh with DMMoab and test defining a tag on the mesh\n\n
